name: Honey Moon Cutscene Demos
description:
Hello, this is a demo of a few cutcenes and a minigame for a game that I am working on for the RPG Maker Make Something Event". That means some things I have aren't completely finished, or end abruptly. There WILL be spelling errors and grammar errors so please make note that I might not know where they are so please let me know so I can fix them.

This is my first time publishing a small cutscene demo so I am VERY nervous and hope that it at least intrigues someone. If any dialogue sounds clunky please let me know as I had a few areas where I was struggling to think of what the characters would say/do.

The game is supposed to have a few battles, but to make sure the cutscenes work I gave the player 2 skills, where they can use them to insta win or lose a battle to see the different outcomes. The FOLLOWING BATTLES WILL BE THE ONLY ONES THAT YOU CAN USE THE LOSE POWER TO GET THE ALT ENDING OF THE CUTSCENE:

Dovine's fight

Pyre's fight

Game is compressed with RTP.
